Detailed Description

The reply to a all map request packet.

Contains information about the excisting maps.
PosSizeComment
HEADER_SIZE 4 bytes nbrMaps
HEADER_SIZE+4 4 bytes stringCode
HEADER_SIZE+8 4 bytes replyType

MC2BoundingBox *  bbox,
uint32 &  version
) 
 

Method to set boundingbox (if type == BOUNDINGBOX_VER) number i.

Parameters:
i The index of the boundingbox to set.
bbox The bounding box number i.
version Outparameter that is set to the version of this map. The version is the creation time in UNIX-time.
